channel.title: CVE Feed for TP-Link -- TL-WA1201
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TP-Link -- TL-WA1201

item.title: CVE-2021-35004|2024-08-04T00:26:55.839Z -- tp-link -- tl-wa1201
item.description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of TP-Link TL-WA1201 1.0.1 Build 20200709 rel.66244(5553) wireless access points. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability. The specific flaw exists within the handling of DNS responses. A crafted DNS message can trigger an overflow of a fixed-length, stack-based buffer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of root. Was ZDI-CAN-14656.
